mapper.select: SELECT gsoa.sid sid, gsoa.monitoring_stations_id monitoringStationsId, gsoa.stations_type stationsType, gsoa.investigate_date investigateDate,gsoa.contact_phone contactPhone, gsoa.has_litter hasLitter, gsoa.has_sand hasSand, gsoa.has_surface_erosion hasSurfaceErosion, gsoa.has_saline_spot hasSalineSpot, gsoa.bare_land_area_ratio bareLandAreaRatio, gsoa.soil_moisture soilMoisture, gsoa.monitoring_period monitoringPeriod, gsoa.coverage coverage, gsoa.fresh_amount freshAmount, gsoa.dry_amount dryAmount, gsoa.herb_grass_avg_height herbGrassAvgHeight, gsoa.herb_plant_nums herbPlantNums, gsoa.herb_bad_grass_nums herbBadGrassNums, gsoa.herb_avg_fresh_amount herbAvgFreshAmount, gsoa.herb_avg_dry_amount herbAvgDryAmount, gsoa.herb_avg_edible_fresh_amount herbAvgEdibleFreshAmount, gsoa.herb_avg_edible_dry_amount herbAvgEdibleDryAmount, gsoa.first_fresh_amount firstFreshAmount, gsoa.first_dry_amount firstDryAmount, gsoa.first_edible_fresh_amount firstEdibleFreshAmount, gsoa.first_edible_dry_amount firstEdibleDryAmount, gsoa.second_fresh_amount secondFreshAmount, gsoa.second_dry_amount secondDryAmount, gsoa.second_edible_fresh_amount secondEdibleFreshAmount, gsoa.second_edible_dry_amount secondEdibleDryAmount, gsoa.third_fresh_amount thirdFreshAmount, gsoa.third_dry_amount thirdDryAmount, gsoa.third_edible_fresh_amount thirdEdibleFreshAmount, gsoa.third_edible_dry_amount thirdEdibleDryAmount, gsoa.shrubs_avg_height shrubsAvgHeight, gsoa.shrubs_nums shrubsNums, gsoa.shrubs_main_names shrubsMainNames, gsoa.shrubs_coverage_size shrubsCoverageSize, gsoa.shrubs_fresh_amount shrubsFreshAmount, gsoa.shrubs_dry_amount shrubsDryAmount, gsoa.permanent_coverage permanentCoverage, gsoa.permanent_grass_avg_height permanentGrassAvgHeight, gsoa.permanent_shrubs_avg_height permanentShrubsAvgHeight, gsoa.create_user_id createUserId, gsoa.create_user_name createUserName, gsoa.create_time createTime,gsoa.investigate_user_ids investigateUserIds, gsoa.investigate_user_names investigateUserNames, gsoa.erosion_reason erosionReason, gsoa.herb_main_plant herbMainPlant, gsoa.remark remark,gms.city_code cityCode,gms.grass_category grassCategory, gms.grass_type grassType FROM `gms_shrubs_observation_area` gsoa LEFT JOIN gms_monitoring_stations gms ON gsoa.monitoring_stations_id=gms.sid where gsoa.sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

herb_bad_grass_nums = #{herbBadGrassNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},

first_fresh_amount = #{firstFreshAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
first_dry_amount = #{firstDryAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

first_edible_dry_amount = #{firstEdibleDryAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

third_edible_dry_amount = #{thirdEdibleDryAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shrubs_avg_height = #{shrubsAvgHeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shrubs_nums = #{shrubsNums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shrubs_main_names = #{shrubsMainNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shrubs_coverage_size = #{shrubsCoverageSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shrubs_fresh_amount = #{shrubsFreshAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shrubs_dry_amount = #{shrubsDryAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
permanent_coverage = #{permanentCoverage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
permanent_grass_avg_height = #{permanentGrassAvgHeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

investigate_user_ids = #{investigateUserIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
investigate_user_names = #{investigateUserNames,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
erosion_reason = #{erosionReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
herb_main_plant = #{herbMainPlant,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.delete:
delete from gms_shrubs_observation_area where sid in
#{item}
mapper.select:
select ga.attach_path as attachPath,gho.investigate_date as investigateDate1,gso.investigate_date as investigateDate2 from gms_attachment ga left join gms_herb_observation_area gho on gho.sid = ga.business_id left join gms_shrubs_observation_area gso on gso.sid = ga.business_id left join gms_user u on (gso.create_user_id = u.sid or gho.create_user_id = u.sid) left join gms_monitoring_stations gms on(gho.monitoring_stations_id = gms.sid or gso.monitoring_stations_id = gms.sid) where ga.attach_module = '监测点信息' and gms.sid=#{monitoringStationsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (ga.attach_model='ghoa_landscape_photo' or ga.attach_model = "gsoa_landscape_photo" ) and ( gho.stations_type = 0 or gso.stations_type = 0)
and (ga.attach_model='ghoa_landscape_photo' or ga.attach_model = "gsoa_landscape_photo" ) and ( gho.stations_type = 1 or gso.stations_type = 1)
and ( ga.attach_model = 'ghoa_perpetual_photo' or ga.attach_model='gsoa_perpetual_photo')
and ((gho.investigate_date>='${minDate}' and gho.investigate_date<='${maxDate}') or (gso.investigate_date>='${minDate}' and gso.investigate_date<='${maxDate}')) and u.city_code like '%${cityCode}%'

select ga.attach_path as attachPath,gho.investigate_date as investigateDate1,gso.investigate_date as investigateDate2 from gms_attachment ga left join gms_herb_observation_area gho on gho.sid = ga.business_id left join gms_shrubs_observation_area gso on gso.sid = ga.business_id left join gms_user u on (gso.create_user_id = u.sid or gho.create_user_id = u.sid) left join gms_monitoring_stations gms on(gho.monitoring_stations_id = gms.sid or gso.monitoring_stations_id = gms.sid) where ga.attach_module = '监测点信息' and gms.sid=#{monitoringStationsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and (ga.attach_model='ghoa_landscape_photo' or ga.attach_model = "gsoa_landscape_photo" ) and ( gho.stations_type = 0 or gso.stations_type = 0)
and (ga.attach_model='ghoa_landscape_photo' or ga.attach_model = "gsoa_landscape_photo" ) and ( gho.stations_type = 1 or gso.stations_type = 1)
and ((gho.investigate_date>='${minDate}' and gho.investigate_date<='${maxDate}') or (gso.investigate_date>='${minDate}' and gso.investigate_date<='${maxDate}')) and u.city_code like '%${cityCode}%'
